greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: exp(-exp(-x)+1+x).
comment: Equals double binomial transform of A014182. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 31 2008
formula: G.f.: 1/(1-x*Q(0)), where Q(k)= 1 + x/(1 - x - x*(k+1)/(x - 1/Q(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 19 2013
G.f.: 1/W(0), where W(k) = 1 - x - x/(1 + x*(k+1)/W(k+1) ); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Nov 07 2014
a(n) = exp(1) * (-1)^n * Sum_{k>=0} (-1)^k * (k - 1)^n / k!. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 20 2019
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_ and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 10 2005
